goal: Refactor src/renderer to eliminate manual DOM manipulations, modularize App.tsx, decouple DnD logic, and consolidate Zustand stores.

tasks.title: Layout System Overhaul
tasks.description: Refactor EditorLayout.tsx, GoogleDocsLayout.tsx, and ScrivenerLayout.tsx to rely strictly on react-resizable-panels instead of manual window.addEventListener pointermove logic. Eliminate hardcoded width calculations.

tasks.title: App.tsx Monolith Deconstruction
tasks.description: Extract global shortcuts to a ShortcutProvider. Extract View/Routing rendering logic into smaller chunk components from App.tsx.

tasks.title: DnD Simplification
tasks.description: Decouple GlobalDragContext.tsx business logic from the routing/layout mechanisms. Refactor EditorDropZones to use native dnd-kit collision detection.

tasks.title: Store Consolidation
tasks.description: Consolidate the 12 scattered Zustand stores. Merge heavily coupled stores (e.g., uiStore, editorStatusStore) to prevent state synchronization bugs.
